question: What does trust mean to you in a relationship?
What kind of actions make you feel safe emotionally?
Have you ever had your trust broken? How did you heal?
What can I do to help you trust me more?
What are your fears when it comes to our relationship?
When do you feel closest to me?
What’s something small I do that makes you smile inside?
If we could improve one thing in how we connect, what would it be?
Do you feel emotionally seen by me? Why or why not?
What’s one memory of us that you replay in your head?
What is something from your past relationship that hurt you?
Is there a part of your past you’re still healing from?
What did you learn from the first time we tried dating?
What parts of your past shaped how you love today?
What’s one thing you wish your past self knew about relationships?
What part of yourself are you currently working on?
How do you usually handle conflict or disagreements?
What kind of partner do you hope to become?
What’s one healthy habit we could build together?
How can we support each other in becoming better people?
What does an ideal relationship look like to you a year from now?
What are your non-negotiables for a long-term partner?
What kind of life do you hope we can create together?
Are there things you’re afraid to tell me about your future plans?
If everything worked out perfectly, what would we be doing 5 years from now?
What’s something you'd love to do to me but haven’t yet?
Describe in detail your favorite way to be touched.
What’s your wildest sexual fantasy involving just the two of us?
What’s something dirty you’ve imagined during the day... about me?
If we were alone with no rules for one night, what would you want to do?
What do you find most irresistible about me — physically or otherwise?
If I kissed you right now, where would you want it to lead?
What outfit of mine turns you on the most?
If we were alone on a weekend getaway, what would you want us to do all day?
What's one way I could tease you that would drive you crazy—in a good way?
